an10.141:1.1: “I will teach you the mortifying principle and the unmortifying. …
an10.141:1.3: And what is the mortifying principle?
an10.141:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.141:1.5: This is called the mortifying principle.
an10.141:1.6: And what is the unmortifying principle?
an10.141:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.141:1.8: This is called the unmortifying principle.”
